TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecureString extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class SecureString Implements IDisposable
public ref class SecureString sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示应保密的文本，例如在不再需要时将其从计算机内存中删除。

span.span: Represents text that should be kept confidential, such as by deleting it from computer memory when no longer needed.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不建议使用`SecureString`类进行新的开发。We don't recommend that you use the `SecureString` class for new development. 有关详细信息, 请参阅 GitHub 上的[SecureString 不应使用](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0001.md)。For more information, see [SecureString shouldn't be used](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0001.md) on GitHub. 是提供安全度量值的字符串类型。 is a string type that provides a measure of security. 它尝试避免以纯文本形式在进程内存中存储可能敏感的字符串。It tries to avoid storing potentially sensitive strings in process memory as plain text. (但是, 若要了解限制, 请参阅 "[安全设置 SecureString"](#HowSecure)部分。)实例初始化时或修改值时, 将使用基础平台支持的机制自动保护实例的值。(For limitations, however, see the [How secure is SecureString?](#HowSecure) section.) The value of an instance of is automatically protected using a mechanism supported by the underlying platform when the instance is initialized or when the value is modified. 您的应用程序可以通过调用方法来使实例不可变, 并防止进一步的修改。Your application can render the instance immutable and prevent further modification by invoking the method. 实例的最大长度为65536个字符。The maximum length of a instance is 65,536 characters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现 接口。This type implements the interface. 使用完该类型的实例后, 应直接或间接释放该实例。When you have finished using an instance of the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 类及其成员对 COM 不可见。The class and its members are not visible to COM. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 本节内容：In this section: [字符串与SecureString](#vsString) [String vs. SecureString](#vsString) [SecureString 操作](#Ops) [SecureString operations](#Ops) [SecureString 和互操作](#interop) [SecureString and interop](#interop) [SecureString 的安全程度如何？How secure is SecureString?](#HowSecure) ## String 与 SecureStringString versus SecureString 类的实例是不可变的, 并且在不再需要时不能以编程方式计划进行垃圾回收; 也就是说, 实例在创建后是只读的, 并且不能预测何时将实例从计算机内存中删除。An instance of the class is both immutable and, when no longer needed, cannot be programmatically scheduled for garbage collection; that is, the instance is read-only after it is created, and it is not possible to predict when the instance will be deleted from computer memory. 因为实例是不可变的, 所以看起来修改现有实例的操作实际上会创建它要操作的副本。Because instances are immutable, operations that appear to modify an existing instance actually create a copy of it to manipulate. 因此, 如果对象包含敏感信息 (如密码、信用卡号或个人数据), 则在使用该信息时可能会出现一种风险, 因为应用程序无法从计算机内存中删除数据.Consequently, if a object contains sensitive information such as a password, credit card number, or personal data, there is a risk the information could be revealed after it is used because your application cannot delete the data from computer memory. 对象类似于对象, 因为它具有一个文本值。A object is similar to a object in that it has a text value. 但是, 对象的值固定在内存中, 可以使用基础操作系统提供的保护机制 (如加密), 直到应用程序将其标记为只读, 并可以从计算机内存中删除。由应用程序调用方法或 .NET Framework 垃圾回收器。However, the value of a object is pinned in memory, may use a protection mechanism, such as encryption, provided by the underlying operating system, can be modified until your application marks it as read-only, and can be deleted from computer memory either by your application calling the method or by the .NET Framework garbage collector. 有关类的限制的讨论, 请参阅 "[安全设置 SecureString"](#HowSecure)部分。For a discussion of the limitations of the class, see the [How secure is SecureString?](#HowSecure) section. [返回页首Back to top](#top) ## SecureString 操作SecureString operations 类包括允许你执行以下操作的成员:The class includes members that allow you to do the following: 实例化对象Instantiate a object 通过调用对象的无参数构造函数来实例化对象。You instantiate a object by calling its parameterless constructor. 向对象添加字符Add characters to a object 可以通过 调用对象的或方法, 一次将一个字符添加到对象。 You can add a single character at a time to a object by calling its or method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永远不应从构造 对象,因为敏感数据已受到不可变类的内存持久性后果的限制。A object should never be constructed from a , because the sensitive data is already subject to the memory persistence consequences of the immutable class. 构造对象的最佳方式是从非实时的非托管源 (例如方法)。The best way to construct a object is from a character-at-a-time unmanaged source, such as the method. 从对象中删除字符Remove characters from a object 可以通过调用方法来替换单个字符、通过调用方法删除单个字符或通过调用方法从实例中移除所有字符。You can replace an individual character by calling the method, remove an individual character by calling the method, or remove all characters from the instance by calling the method. 使对象成为只读Make the object read-only 定义对象表示的字符串后, 调用其方法, 使字符串成为只读的。Once you have defined the string that the object represents, you call its method to make the string read-only. 获取有关对象的信息Get information about the object 类只包含两个提供有关字符串的信息的成员: 其属性 (指示字符串中 UTF16 编码的代码单元的数目) 和, 方法, 用于指示实例是否为只读。The class has only two members that provide information about the string: its property, which indicates the number of UTF16-encoded code units in the string; and the , method, which indicates whether the instance is read-only. 释放分配给实例的内存Release the memory allocated to the instance 由于 实现接口, 因此可以通过调用方法释放其内存。 Because implements the interface, you release its memory by calling the method. 类没有任何成员用于检查、比较或转换的值。 The class has no members that inspect, compare, or convert the value of a . 缺少此类成员可帮助保护实例的值, 以防意外或恶意的公开。The absence of such members helps protect the value of the instance from accidental or malicious exposure. 使用类的适当成员 (如方法) 来操作对象的值。Use appropriate members of the class, such as the method, to manipulate the value of a object. .NET Framework 类库通常以下列方式使用实例:The .NET Framework Class Library commonly uses instances in the following ways: - 使用结构或通过调用具有类型的参数的方法的重载, 为进程提供密码信息。To provide password information to a process by using the structure or by calling an overload of the method that has a parameter of type . - 如果为, 则通过调用具有类型的参数或使用属性的类构造函数来提供网络密码信息。To provide network password information by calling a class constructor that has a parameter of type or by using the property. - 通过调用构造函数或检索属性的值, 为 SQL Server 身份验证提供密码信息。To provide password information for SQL Server Authentication by calling the constructor or retrieving the value of the property. - 将字符串传递到非托管代码。To pass a string to unmanaged code. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[SecureString and 互操作](#interop)部分。For more information, see the [SecureString and interop](#interop) section. [返回页首Back to top](#top) ## SecureString 和互操作SecureString and interop 由于操作系统不直接支持, 因此必须先将对象的值转换为所需的字符串类型, 然后才能将该字符串传递给本机方法。Because the operating system does not directly support , you must convert the value of the object to the required string type before passing the string to a native method. 类具有五种执行此操作的方法:The class has five methods that do this: - , 它将字符串值转换为 COM 识别的二进制字符串 (BSTR)。, which converts the string value to a binary string (BSTR) recognized by COM. - 和, 它将字符串值复制到非托管内存中的 ANSI 字符串。 and , which copy the string value to an ANSI string in unmanaged memory. - 和, 它将字符串值复制到非托管内存中的 Unicode 字符串。 and , which copy the string value to a Unicode string in unmanaged memory. 其中每种方法在非托管内存中创建一个明文字符串。Each of these methods creates a clear-text string in unmanaged memory. 开发人员负责在不再需要该内存时将其从零开始, 并将其释放。It is the responsibility of the developer to zero out and free that memory as soon as it is no longer needed. 每个字符串转换和内存分配方法都有一个对应的方法, 以使分配的内存为零并释放已分配的内存:Each of the string conversion and memory allocation methods has a corresponding method to zero out and free the allocated memory: |分配和转换方法Allocation and conversion method|零和免费方法Zero and free method| |--------------------------------------|--------------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| [返回页首Back to top](#top) ## SecureString 的安全程度如何？How secure is SecureString? 正确创建后, 实例提供的数据保护比更多。When created properly, a instance provides more data protection than a . 当从一个字符的时间源创建字符串时, 将在内存中创建多个中间, 而只创建一个实例。When creating a string from a character-at-a-time source, creates multiple intermediate in memory, whereas creates just a single instance. 对象的垃圾回收是不确定的。Garbage collection of objects is non-deterministic. 此外, 由于未固定其内存, 垃圾回收器将在移动和压缩内存时创建值的其他副本。In addition, because its memory is not pinned, the garbage collector will make additional copies of values when moving and compacting memory. 相反, 分配给对象的内存将固定, 并且可以通过调用方法来释放内存。In contrast, the memory allocated to a object is pinned, and that memory can be freed by calling the method. 虽然实例中存储的数据比实例中存储的数据更安全, 但对实例的安全有很大的限制。Although data stored in a instance is more secure than data stored in a instance, there are significant limitations on how secure a instance is. 这些方法包括：These include: PlatformPlatform 在 Windows 操作系统上, 实例的内部字符数组的内容已加密。On the Windows operating system, the contents of a instance's internal character array are encrypted. 但是, 无论是否缺少 Api 或密钥管理问题, 加密在所有平台上都不可用。However, whether because of missing APIs or key management issues, encryption is not available on all platforms. 由于此平台依赖项, 不会对非 Windows 平台上的内部存储进行加密。Because of this platform dependency, does not encrypt the internal storage on non-Windows platform. 在这些平台上使用其他技术来提供附加保护。Other techniques are used on those platforms to provide additional protection. 持续时间Duration 即使实现能够利用加密, 分配给实例的纯文本也可能会在不同的时间公开: Even if the implementation is able to take advantage of encryption, the plain text assigned to the instance may be exposed at various times: - 由于 Windows 不在操作系统级别提供安全字符串实现, 因此 .NET Framework 仍必须将安全字符串值转换为纯文本表示形式才能使用。Because Windows doesn't offer a secure string implementation at the operating system level, the .NET Framework still has to convert the secure string value to its plain text representation in order to use it. - 每当安全字符串的值由或等方法修改时, 必须对其进行解密 (即转换回纯文本), 修改后再次加密。Whenever the value of the secure string is modified by methods such as or , it must be decrypted (that is, converted back to plain text), modified, and then encrypted again. - 如果在互操作调用中使用安全字符串, 则必须将其转换为 ANSI 字符串、Unicode 字符串或二进制字符串 (BSTR)。If the secure string is used in an interop call, it must be converted to an ANSI string, a Unicode string, or a binary string (BSTR). 有关详细信息, 请参阅[SecureString and 互操作](#interop)部分。For more information, see the [SecureString and interop](#interop) section. 与类相比, 实例的值公开的时间间隔只需缩短。The time interval for which the instance's value is exposed is merely shortened in comparison to the class. 存储与使用情况Storage versus usage 更常见的情况是, 类为应受到保护或保密的字符串值定义存储机制。More generally, the class defines a storage mechanism for string values that should be protected or kept confidential. 但是, 在 .NET Framework 之外, 不支持使用机制。However, outside of the .NET Framework itself, no usage mechanism supports . 这意味着, 必须将安全字符串转换为可由其目标识别的可用形式 (通常为明文格式), 并且必须在用户空间中进行解密和转换。This means that the secure string must be converted to a usable form (typically a clear text form) that can be recognized by its target, and that decryption and conversion must occur in user space. 总体而言 , 比它限制敏感字符串数据的公开更安全。Overall, is more secure than because it limits the exposure of sensitive string data. 但是, 这些字符串可能仍会公开给有权访问原始内存的任何进程或操作, 例如, 在主计算机上运行的恶意进程、进程转储或用户可查看的交换文件。However, those strings may still be exposed to any process or operation that has access to raw memory, such as a malicious process running on the host computer, a process dump, or a user-viewable swap file. 建议的替代方法是对存储在进程外部的凭据使用不透明的句柄, 而不是使用来保护密码。Instead of using to protect passwords, the recommended alternative is to use an opaque handle to credentials that are stored outside of the process. [返回页首Back to top](#top) ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用保护用户的密码, 以将其用作凭据以启动新进程。The following example demonstrates how to use a to secure a user's password for use as a credential to start a new process. [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecureString.Ctor#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecureString.Ctor/cs/ctor4.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecureString.Ctor#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecureString.Ctor/vb/ctor4.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用默认的 (或无参数的) 构造函数来实例化新的对象。The following example uses the default (or parameterless) constructor to instantiate a new object. 然后, 它调用方法以向其添加字符数组。It then calls the method to add an array of characters to it. [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecureString.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecureString.Ctor/cpp/Ctor2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecureString.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecureString.Ctor/cs/Ctor2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecureString.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecureString.Ctor/vb/ctor2.vb#2)] 下面的示例从 对象的值创建对象。The following example creates a object from the value of a object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecureString.Ctor#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecureString.Ctor/cpp/Ctor3.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecureString.Ctor#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecureString.Ctor/cs/Ctor3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecureString.Ctor#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecureString.Ctor/vb/Ctor3.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将新的对象初始化为指定的`length`中`value`的字符数; 然后对实例的值进行加密。This constructor initializes the new object to the number of characters in `value` specified by `length`; the value of the instance is then encrypted. 在C#中, 此构造函数仅在不安全代码的上下文中定义。In C#, this constructor is defined only in the context of unsafe code. ## Examples 下面的示例通过将新对象的构造函数传递到字符数组来实例化该对象。The following example instantiates a new object by passing its constructor a pointer to a character array. [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecureString.Ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.securestring.ctor2/cpp/ctor1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecureString.Ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.securestring.ctor2/cs/ctor1.cs#1)]

span.span: Appends a character to the end of the current secure string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果实现使用保护机制 (如加密), 则此安全字符串的值 (如果有) 不受保护;`c`追加了, 则安全字符串的新值将被重新保护。If the implementation uses a protection mechanism, such as encryption, the value of this secure string, if any, is unprotected; `c` is appended; then the new value of the secure string is re-protected. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了、 、 、 和方法如何影响对象的值。The following example demonstrates how the , , , , and methods affect the value of a object. [!code-cpp[SecureString.xAt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xAt/CPP/SecureString.xAt.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SecureString.xAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xAt/CS/xat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SecureString.xAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xAt/VB/xat.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用和方法收集密码中的字符。The following example demonstrates how the and methods can be used to collect the characters in a password. [!code-cpp[SecureString.xChar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xChar/CPP/SecureString.xChar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SecureString.xChar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xChar/CS/xchar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SecureString.xChar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xChar/VB/xchar.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的实例被标记为只读, 则该实例的副本将不是只读的。If an instance of a is marked read-only, the copy of that instance will not be read-only.

summary.span: 释放由当前 对象使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将二进制零写入到包含此对象的值的已分配内存, 然后释放已分配的内存。 The method writes binary zeroes to the allocated memory that contains the value of this object, then frees the allocated memory. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void InsertAt (int index, char c);
.method public hidebysig instance void InsertAt(int32 index, char c) cil managed
Public Sub InsertAt (index As Integer, c As Char)
public: void InsertAt(int index, char c);

param.name: index
param.span: 插入参数 的索引位置。

span.span: The index position where parameter is inserted.
The character to insert.

summary.span: 在此安全字符串中的指定索引位置插入一个字符。

span.span: Inserts a character in this secure string at the specified index position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引从零开始;此安全字符串中的第一个字符的索引位置为零。The index is zero-based; the first character in this secure string is at index position zero. 如果实现使用保护机制 (如加密), 则安全字符串的值 (如果有) 不受保护;`c`插入到指定的索引位置, 然后重新保护新值。If the implementation uses a protection mechanism, such as encryption, the value of the secure string, if any, is unprotected; `c` is inserted at the specified index position; then the new value is re-protected. 如果的`index`参数设置为此实例的长度 , 则方法将生成与方法相同的结果,这会在安全字符串的末尾插入一个字符。The method yields the same results as the method, which inserts a character at the end of a secure string, if the `index` parameter of is set to the length of this instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了、 、 、 和方法如何影响对象的值。The following example demonstrates how the , , , , and methods affect the value of a object. [!code-cpp[SecureString.xAt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xAt/CPP/SecureString.xAt.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SecureString.xAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xAt/CS/xat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SecureString.xAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xAt/VB/xat.vb#1)]

span.span: is less than zero, or greater than the length of this secure string.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 执行此操作将使此安全字符串的长度超过 65,536 个字符。

span.span: Performing this operation would make the length of this secure string greater than 65,536 characters.

exception.span: 保护或取消保护此安全字符串的值时出错。

span.span: An error occurred while protecting or unprotecting the value of this secure string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsReadOnly() cil managed

summary.span: 指示此安全字符串是否标记为只读。

span.span: Indicates whether this secure string is marked read-only.

returns.span: 如果此安全字符串标记为只读，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this secure string is marked read-only; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 方法将实例标记为只读后, 任何修改实例值的尝试都将引发。After an instance of is marked read-only by the method, any attempt to modify the value of the instance throws an . 使用方法来测试是否为只读, 然后再尝试修改。 Use the method to test whether a is read-only before attempting to modify it.

exception.span: 已处置此安全字符串。

span.span: This secure string has already been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Length As Integer
public: property int Length { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前安全字符串中的字符数。

span.span: Gets the number of characters in the current secure string.

value.span: 此安全字符串中 对象的数目。

span.span: The number of objects in this secure string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回此实例中的对象数, 而不是 Unicode 字符数。 The property returns the number of objects in this instance, not the number of Unicode characters. Unicode 字符可能由多个对象表示。A Unicode character might be represented by more than one object. 实例的最大长度为65536个字符。The maximum length of a instance is 65,536 characters.

exception.span: 已处置此安全字符串。

span.span: This secure string has already been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MakeReadOnly() cil managed

summary.span: 将此安全字符串的文本值设置为只读。

span.span: Makes the text value of this secure string read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数初始化类的实例的文本值, 并使用、、、和方法修改该值。 Initialize the text value of an instance of the class with the constructors, and modify the value with the , , , , and methods. 进行最终修改后, 使用方法使实例的值不可变 (只读)。After you have made your final modifications, use the method to make the value of the instance immutable (read-only). 将该值标记为只读后, 对其进行修改的任何进一步尝试都将引发。After the value is marked as read-only, any further attempt to modify it throws an . 调用的效果是永久性的, 因为类不提供任何方法来使安全字符串再次被修改。The effect of invoking is permanent because the class provides no means to make the secure string modifiable again. 使用方法来测试实例是否为只读的。 Use the method to test whether an instance of is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用和方法收集密码中的字符。The following example demonstrates how the and methods can be used to collect the characters in a password. 密码在收集后变为只读。After the password is collected, it is made read-only. [!code-cpp[SecureString.xChar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xChar/CPP/SecureString.xChar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SecureString.xChar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xChar/CS/xchar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SecureString.xChar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xChar/VB/xchar.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed

param.name: index
param.span: 此安全字符串中的字符的索引位置。

span.span: The index position of a character in this secure string.

summary.span: 从此安全字符串中的指定索引位置移除字符。

span.span: Removes the character at the specified index position from this secure string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引从零开始;此实例中的第一个字符的索引位置为零。The index is zero-based; the first character in this instance is at index position zero. 如果实现使用保护机制 (如加密), 则此安全字符串的值 (如果有) 不受保护;移除指定索引位置处的字符;然后, 重新保护新值。If the implementation uses a protection mechanism, such as encryption, the value of this secure string, if any, is unprotected; the character at the specified index position is removed; then the new value is re-protected. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了、 、 、 和方法如何影响对象的值。The following example demonstrates how the , , , , and methods affect the value of a object. [!code-cpp[SecureString.xAt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xAt/CPP/SecureString.xAt.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SecureString.xAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xAt/CS/xat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SecureString.xAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xAt/VB/xat.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用和方法收集密码中的字符。The following example demonstrates how the and methods can be used to collect the characters in a password. [!code-cpp[SecureString.xChar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xChar/CPP/SecureString.xChar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SecureString.xChar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xChar/CS/xchar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SecureString.xChar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SecureString.xChar/VB/xchar.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetAt (int index, char c);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetAt(int32 index, char c) cil managed
Public Sub SetAt (index As Integer, c As Char)
public: void SetAt(int index, char c);

param.name: index
param.span: 此安全字符串中的某个现有字符的索引位置。

span.span: The index position of an existing character in this secure string
A character that replaces the existing character.

summary.span: 将指定索引位置上的现有字符替换为其他字符。

span.span: Replaces the existing character at the specified index position with another character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引从零开始;此实例中的第一个字符的索引位置为零。The index is zero-based; the first character in this instance is at index position zero. 如果实现使用保护机制 (如加密), 则安全字符串的值 (如果有) 不受保护;`c`将分配给指定的索引位置, 然后重新保护新的值。If the implementation uses a protection mechanism, such as encryption, the value of the secure string, if any, is unprotected; `c` is assigned to the specified index position; then the new value is re-protected. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了、 、 、 和方法如何影响对象的值。The following example demonstrates how the , , , , and methods affect the value of a object.
